title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Simulation-Based Scientific Literacy and Reasoning Skills Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can independently apply the scientific reasoning process (hypothesis formulation-verification-revision) to solve complex social problems.
Learners demonstrate the ability to derive evidence-based conclusions by analyzing data collected in VR simulation environments.
Learners can synthesize peer feedback and improve problem-solving solutions through critical inquiry in collaborative learning settings.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
